parameters.content:
## **ðŸ“‹ Complete Node Names List:**

### **ðŸ“§ Email Processing Chain:**
1. **`ðŸ“§ Email: Datto Alert Received`** (Microsoft Outlook Trigger)
2. **`ðŸ” Filter: Valid Sender Check`** (IF node)
3. **`ðŸ“ Filter: Backup Alert Subject Check`** (IF node)
4. **`âš™ï¸ Parse: Extract Alert Details`** (Code node)

### **ðŸ” Device & Duplicate Detection:**
5. **`ðŸ–¥ï¸ RMM: Get Device Status`** (Datto RMM node)
6. **`ðŸŽ« Search: Find Existing Tickets`** (Autotask node)
7. **`â“ Check: Any Tickets Found`** (IF node)
8. **`ðŸ”„ Logic: Duplicate Detection & Branching`** (Code node)

### **ðŸ§® Processing & Analysis:**
9. **`â±ï¸ Calculate: Time Elapsed & Priority`** (Code node)
10. **`ðŸ” Extract: Device Online Status`** (Code node)

### **ðŸ”€ Decision Points:**
11. **`ðŸ”€ Branch: Handle Duplicates vs New Tickets`** (Switch node)
12. **`ðŸ”€ Branch: Device Status Router`** (Switch node)

### **âœ… Route 0: OFFLINE Device Path**
13. **`âœ… Create: Completed Audit Ticket (Offline)`** (Autotask node)

### **ðŸŽ« Route 1: ONLINE Device Path**
14. **`ðŸŽ« Create: Actionable Ticket (Online)`** (Autotask node)

### **ðŸ§ª Testing Path:**
15. **`ðŸ§ª Test: Manual Trigger`** (Manual trigger)

---

## **ðŸš§ Still To Build:**

### **TRUE Path (Duplicates Found):**
- **`ðŸ“ Update: Add Note to Existing Ticket`** (Autotask node)

### **Route 2: NOT_FOUND Device Path:**
- **`âš ï¸ Create: Actionable Ticket (Device Not Found)`** (Autotask node)

### **Optional Enhancements:**
- **`âœ… Success: Ticket Created Notification`** (notification nodes)
- **`âŒ Error: Workflow Failure Handler`** (error handling)

This gives you the complete picture of your workflow structure! ðŸŽ¯

json.subject: Endpoint Backup Agent (AT01-03-012) Checkin Alert for Organization (Astech Air Conditioning)
json.bodyPreview:
Agent Alert | Endpoint Backup for PCs

Agent Not Checking In

AT01-03-012 has stopped communicating with the Datto Cloud. The last time we've heard from this agent was on December 20, 2024 15:23, which exceeds your configured threshold of 7 days.

E

body.content:
Agent Alert | Endpoint Backup for PCs

Agent Not Checking In

AT01-03-012 has stopped communicating with the Datto Cloud. The last time we've heard from this agent was on December 20, 2024 15:23, which exceeds your configured threshold of 7 days.

ENDPOINT BACKUP FOR PCs KB

Agent Name: AT01-03-012
Agent Shortcode: R8PK7XP7Q
Organization Name: Astech Air Conditioning

You are receiving this email because you are subscribed to receive them. To see and edit alerts and their subscribed users, go to the Astech Air Conditioning Endpoint Backup for PCs Settings page.

If you have any questions, please submit them through Support Help Center

Please do not reply to this email.
